teacherRegistration.nameStepDescription: Kāore e whakaputaina tō ingoa, ka tiakina kia haumaru, kia matatapu hoki.
teacherRegistration.phoneStepDescription: Kāore e whakaputaina tō nama waea, ka tiakina kia haumaru, kia matatapu hoki.
teacherRegistration.phoneConsent: Āe, ka whakaae ahau kia waea mai te Scratch Team ki te hāpono i taku Pūkete Pouako, ina hiahiatia
teacherRegistration.validationPhoneNumbe: Tēnā, whakaurua tētahi nama waea pono
teacherRegistration.validationPhoneConse: Me whakaae koe kia hāpono tō Pūkete Pouako.
teacherRegistration.privacyDescription: Kāore e whakaputaina ō mōhiohio, ka tiakina kia haumaru, kia matatapu hoki.
teacherRegistration.checkAll: Takina ngā tuemi e hāngai ana
teacherRegistration.orgChoiceAfterschool: He Akoranga ā Muri i te Kura
teacherRegistration.useScratchStepTitle: He aha ōu whāinga mō Scratch
teacherRegistration.useScratchStepDescri: Tēnā, whakamārama mai ō whakaaro mō te whakamahi i te Scratch. He aha ai, tō mātou pātai nei
teacherRegistration.useScratchMaxLength: Kia taea te whakamārama te uru ki te 300 ngā pū
teacherRegistration.howUseScratch: Ki ō whakaaro he aha ngā whāinga mō Scratch i tō rōpū?
teacherRegistration.emailStepDescription: Ka tuku mātou i tētahi īmēra tūtohu ki a koe, kia taea ai te uru ki tō Pūkete Pouako Scratch.
teacherRegistration.validationEmailMatch: Kaore ngā ī-mēra e rite ana
teacherRegistration.validationAge: Sorry, teachers must be at least 16 years old
